The current Sotheby's tsuba auction references the Yagyu family pattern book on various Yagyu lots.

Examples:

Lot 828:

"The design is illustrated in the Yagyu family pattern book, no. 78"

Lot 829
"The design is no. 39 in the Yagyu family pattern book"



I've heard of its existence but never heard of it being published.  Has anyone else? 



David Zincavage
